name: Recess Riot
summary:
From the creators of the cult hit game Super Mega Worm, comes a new and fresh arcade game.
Recess Riot is an unique and challenging Action/Arcade game comprised of multiple game modes.
Jump! mode is a timing based jump rope game with a twist. Ropers will change rope speed and patterns. Ropers will also shift left and right to keep the players on their toes. Advance stages will require players to jump rope and dodge incoming objects simultaneously.
